an7.21:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati sārandade cetiye.
an7.21:1.3: Atha kho sambahulā licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā etadavoca:
an7.21:1.5: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an7.21:1.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te licchavī bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an7.21:2.2: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī abhiṇhaṃ sannipātā bhavissanti sannipātabahulā;
an7.21:2.3: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (1)
an7.21:3.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī samaggā sannipatissanti, samaggā vuṭṭhahissanti, samaggā vajjikaraṇīyāni karissanti;
an7.21:3.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (2)
an7.21:4.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī apaññattaṃ na paññāpessanti, paññattaṃ na samucchindissanti, yathāpaññatte porāṇe vajjidhamme samādāya vattissanti;
an7.21:4.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (3)
an7.21:5.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī ye te vajjīnaṃ vajjimahallakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti, tesañca sotabbaṃ maññissanti;
an7.21:5.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (4)
an7.21:6.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī yā tā kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo tā na okassa pasayha vāsessanti;
an7.21:6.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (5)
an7.21:7.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnaṃ vajjicetiyāni abbhantarāni ceva bāhirāni ca tāni sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti, tesañca dinnapubbaṃ katapubbaṃ dhammikaṃ baliṃ no parihāpessanti;
an7.21:7.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (6)
an7.21:8.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti susaṃvihitā bhavissati:
an7.21:8.2: ‘kinti anāgatā ca arahanto vijitaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ, āgatā ca arahanto vijite phāsuṃ vihareyyun’ti;
an7.21:8.3: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (7)
an7.21:9.1: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā vajjīsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihāniyesu dhammesu vajjī sandississanti;
an7.21:9.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
